item.title: What's next for LaFleur, Brian Gutekunst after the Packers' wild-card loss?
item.description: Green Bay's head coach and GM have one year left on their contracts.

item.title: From future HOF pitchers to a veteran catcher: Best fits for under-the-radar MLB free agents
item.description: Did your favorite team miss out on the biggest stars of this winter? Here are 15 players to sign instead.

item.title: Power Rankings: Where every team stands in the new year
item.description: Though there are still free agents to be signed, let's reassess the standings midway through the offseason.

item.title: Solak: The Bears are a second-half team, and you can never count them out
item.description: Perhaps we shouldn't be surprised the Bears came back to beat the Packers. They've been doing this all season.

item.title: Deflated LaFleur deflects job talk after Pack loss
item.description: Deflated after his team's stunning 31-27 loss to the Chicago Bears on Saturday night, Green Bay coach Matt LaFleur told reporters that he wants to rem...
